msg.msgText: A request to create a non-shared durable message consumer failed because an active non-shared durable consumer already exists: Name={0} ClientID={1}.

msgExplanation.p: Only one active consumer at a time is permitted for a non-shared durable subscription. You can modify the properties of an existing non-shared durable subscription only when there are no active consumers. You can create an additional durable message consumer for this ClientID by using a different subscription name.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the subscription names are unique and that a non-shared durable subscription has no active consumers before you modify it.
